content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Emilia Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not agree on a final price because I felt that the offered price of 1,300 Euros per month was already low enough for me to consider it fair.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as 10?
name: Evaluator

content: I rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as 10 because they were respectful, understanding, and showed a willingness to negotiate in a fair and reasonable manner. They were also polite and respectful throughout the negotiation process.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
